descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Cricket X – The Ultimate VR Cricket Experience on Meta Quest!
Step into the crease with Cricket X, the most immersive and realistic VR cricket game designed to sharpen your batting skills and deliver hours of entertainment. Whether you’re chasing thrilling targets, perfecting your shots, or taking on exciting challenges, Cricket X is the ultimate VR cricket training simulator for players of all levels.

Game Modes
•	Challenge Mode: Set your target score, overs, and wickets. Chase totals and test your strategy and accuracy.
•	Training Mode: Recreate any delivery you want by customizing swing, spin, speed, bowler type, bounce, and pitch pace. Set the line and length to perfect every shot and refine your skills.
•	Demo Mode: Face deliveries with increasing difficulty, with voice-over hints announcing each ball—keeping you focused and ready.
•	Special Challenge Mode: Take on thrilling challenges featuring unique and unpredictable deliveries to push your batting skills.

Key Features
•	Day & Night Mode: Play in dynamic lighting for a realistic stadium feel.
•	Realistic Physics: Experience true-to-life ball swing, spin, and bounce.
•	Replay & Analytics: Analyze your shots with replays, pitch maps, and scoring zones.
•	Batting Styles: Switch between left-hand and right-hand batting seamlessly.
•	Real Bat Support: Attach your controller to a real bat for maximum immersion.
•	Passthrough Mode: Play safely with real-world visuals around you.

Play Cricket X – The Next Level of VR Cricket!
